description: Keep your dog warm and stylish this winter with our custom coat fitting service. We offer personalized fittings for all breeds, choosing from a variety of materials like fleece, wool, and waterproof fabrics. Our service includes measuring, fitting, and suggesting the best winter outfit that ensures comfort, flexibility, and warmth during walks, playtime, or outdoor adventures.

Professional winter grooming service including a gentle bath with moisturizing winter-safe shampoo, paw balm treatment, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and fur conditioning. This service ensures your dog stays healthy, comfortable, and ready to enjoy snowy or icy outdoor environments without paw irritation or dryness.

Ensure your pet enjoys cozy and insulated sleep during cold nights. Our team delivers and sets up high-quality winter beds, including memory foam options, heated mats, and soft blankets. We arrange the bed in the safest, most comfortable corner of your home, guaranteeing your pet a warm and restful sleep throughout the winter season.

Protect your dog's paws from harmful winter road salts, chemicals, and ice melts. Our professional paw cleaning service gently washes and moisturizes paws after every walk, removing irritants that could cause cracking, dryness, or infections. We also provide recommendations for paw balms and protective booties for extreme winter conditions.

Comprehensive winter health checkup for dogs to detect potential cold-related issues such as arthritis flare-ups, hypothermia risks, respiratory problems, and skin dryness. Includes full physical examination, blood tests, vaccination review, nutritional advice, and recommendations for protective clothing or supplements for winter wellness.

Rent fashionable and warm outfits for your dog for special events, photoshoots, parties, or winter strolls. Our collection includes sweaters, coats, scarves, boots, and full winter ensembles. Outfits are sanitized, high-quality, and comfortable to ensure your dog can enjoy the winter in style.
